channel.title: Lostcast
channel.description: Every Tuesday, independent game developers Matt Hackett and Geoff Blair discuss the chaotic circus of running an indie game company.
channel.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
channel.itunes:subtitle: Indie Game Dev Podcast
channel.itunes:keywords: video games, html5, games game dev, game development, javascript, web dev, indie
channel.itunes:summary: Every Tuesday, independent game developers Matt Hackett and Geoff Blair discuss the chaotic circus of running an indie game company.

item.title: Lostcast 1: Hello World
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Hello World
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff discuss their backgrounds and various aspects of Onslaught! development.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games

item.title: Lostcast 2: Code Like a Fox
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Code Like a Fox
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff talk with HTML5 game developer Louis Stowasser about his Crafty game engine.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 3: Ramble On
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Ramble On
item.itunes:summary: Join us as we ramble on about locking down your HTML5 game's source code
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 4: Native Coffee
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Native Coffee
item.itunes:summary: What's NaCl and why does it kind of scare us?
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 5: Left 4 Questions
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Left 4 Questions
item.itunes:summary: We answer 4 HTML5 game dev questions from a listener.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 6: A Wild Tom Appears
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: A Wild Tom Appears
item.itunes:summary: Tom discusses xcjs, Game Closure and HTML5 tech.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 7: HTML5, The Bad Parts
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: HTML5, The Bad Parts
item.itunes:summary: We collected things devs hate about HTML5 via Twitter and talk all about them!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 8: Attack of the Clones!
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Attack of the Clones!
item.itunes:summary: With so many companies cloning out companies' games, why don't we talk this out?
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 9: That's Rich
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: That's Rich
item.itunes:summary: Rich Davey is a veteran flash game developer and is really excited about HTML5. Let's talk it out!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 10: Indiependence Day
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Indiependence Day
item.itunes:summary: LDG is now a full-on indie game company and we celebrate by open sourcing our flagship product.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 11: LDG @ GDC
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: LDG @ GDC
item.itunes:summary: LDG went to GDC where we won a contest and other exciting stuff happened.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 12: Arnother Interview
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Arnother Interview
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk shop with HTML5 performance expert and Game Closure employee Arno van der Vegt.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 13: OS Xcellence
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: OS Xcellence
item.itunes:summary: Matt and Geoff talk about pimping out OS X and HTML games and all that!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 14: Quite an Impact
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Quite an Impact
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt interview Impact game engine creator Dominic Szablewski.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 15: Deus Ex Game Mechanics
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Deus Ex Game Mechanics
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk about lots of things HTML5 and game related, but mostly talk about interesting game mechanics!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 16: We Heart Huckaby
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: We Heart Huckaby
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk with HTML5 game pioneer Joseph Huckaby, creator of Effect Games.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 17: Vincent Priceless
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Vincent Priceless
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt talk with veteran game and Chrome developer Vincent Scheib.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 18: The Sorceror's Sponsor
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: The Sorceror's Sponsor
item.itunes:summary: Announcing our first sponsor: Pokki! Geoff and Matt talk about how awesome HTML5 gaming is right now.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 19: Canvas Story
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Canvas Story
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt answer a listener question about canvas scaling and catch you up on all things LDG. Don't forget to check out our sponsor Pokki!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 20: OUYA or Ooh, no?
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: OUYA or Ooh, no?
item.itunes:summary: In episode 20, we discuss the much buzzed-about OUYA, Onslaught! Arena on Brass Monkey, and the launch of our new game Lunch Bug.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 21: What Windows?
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: What Windows?
item.itunes:summary: In episode 21, talk about an arcade convention, the WHATWG/W3C split and more!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 22: HTMLd5
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: HTMLd5
item.itunes:summary: In episode 22, we talk about all kinds of goings-on in the HTML5 games space, including the Dragons Gameboard kickstarter, and the tools used to make HTML5 games. Don’t forget to comment if you want Geoff to blog more!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 23: HTML5.blur()
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: HTML5.blur()
item.itunes:summary: In episode 23, we talk about HTML5 and how sometimes it doesn't have anything to do with the success of your game. That said, the industry is in love with HTML5 right now, with lots of new companies and money being injected into it.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 24: Return of the Geoff-and-I
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Return of the Geoff-and-I
item.itunes:summary: We're back! And talking about the disaster-in-progress that is Lava Blade, as well as our next game, project codename: Warhead!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 25: 11001
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:summary: Entity/component systems and lots of rambly independent game dev stuff.
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.title: Lostcast 26: Foreach Episode
item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Foreach Episode
item.itunes:summary: Geoff and Matt go through each and every one of the previous 25 episodes!
item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast

item.itunes:author: Lost Decade Games
item.itunes:subtitle: Entity/Component Proponents

item.itunes:keywords: html5, games, lost decade games, gamedev, podcast, indie, lostcast
